description: Fantasma Games AB engages in the design, development, marketing, and trade of interactive entertainment. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm. The company went IPO on 2021-03-23. As a gaming studio, Fantasma Games AB (publ) capitalizes on the already existing infrastructure of licensed platforms for distributing its games to customers. Fantasma Games AB (publ) distributes its games through partners and has over 150 operators such as, Unibet, Betsson, LeoVegas and Svenska Spel. By using partners for distribution, the Company places all focus on the actual game production. So far, the Company has launched eleven games for the European market. All game production and Company’s activities takes place in Sweden.
name: Fantasma Games AB (publ)
